metadata.name: Sinners #1
metadata.description:
an evolving instrumental piece revolving around a static three note motif.

after having experimented with various NFT formats I have yet to do a pure music NFT, so this will be my first.

this will also be my first web3 exclusive track and an active experiment in releasing music in 2022. it's the first time in a long time that I'm not making Daniel Ek richer.

written & recorded by André Allen Anjos.

artwork by Andrés Reisinger.
